bibl.title: Hawara (Fayum): Tombs and Houses on the Surface. A Preliminary Report of the K.U. Leuven Site Survey.
bibl.note: Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (Section: Ancient History), Fayum Project. - Introduction. - Topographical importance of Hawara. - Archaeological survey in the Fayum. - Destructive human interventions at Hawara. - Preliminary results of the Hawara 2000-Survey. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Ricerche di Egittologia e di Antichità Copte

bibl.seg: UYTTERHOEVEN Inge, Hawara (Fayum): Tombs and Houses on the Surface. A Preliminary Report of the K.U. Leuven Site Survey.
Ricerche di Egittologia e di Antichità Copte 3 (2001) pp. 45-83, 4 figg., 1 plan.

Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (Section: Ancient History), Fayum Project. - Introduction. - Topographical importance of Hawara. - Archaeological survey in the Fayum. - Destructive human interventions at Hawara. - Preliminary results of the Hawara 2000-Survey. - Conclusion.
